alternatives.transcript: ass jamal welcome to islamic bank how may i assist you today while lake mass i'm a farmer and i've been exploring financing options for agricultural equipment i've heard about your agricultural finance based on mo ab can you explain how it works certainly jamal mo is a compliant financing structure in this arrangement the bank purchases the asset such as agricultural equipment on your behalf and sells it to you at a fixed profit margin the cost price and profit margin are disclosed front ensuring transparency i see how does this differ from conventional loans the primary distinction lies in the absence of interest re as it is prohibited in islam with mara the transaction is trade based the bank first takes ownership of the asset and then sells it to you with an agreed upon profit this structure adhere to shi principles got it and what are some benefits of using agricultural finance through mo ab good question first it is fully shi compliant aligning with islamic values second the fixed profit margin provides predictability in repayment amounts which can assist with financial planning third the financing is versatile covering various agricultural needs such as equipment seeds fertilizer and irrigation systems that's helpful to know what types of agricultural equipment can i finance through this product a variety of agricultural equipment can be financed including tractors harvest irrigation machinery and other specialized tools if you have a specific item in mind we can discuss it further to confirm whether it qualifies under more understood are there any particular requirements i need to meet to apply for this financing yes jamal we require documents such as proof of income from your farming activities business registration or farm ownership documents and a detailed proposal outlining the purpose of the financing additionally we assess your repayment capacity to ensure the arrangement is sustainable i see what is the process of applying for agricultural finance under mo ab the application process is straightforward first you submit your application along with the required documents next we review your application and evaluate the asset you wish to acquire once approved the bank purchases the asset and takes ownership finally we sell the asset to you at the agreed upon price and you repay in installments over the specified period once i take ownership of the asset does the bank remain involved in any way after the asset is sold to you through more it becomes your property completely the bank no longer has any ownership or involvement with the asset however we are available to assist you with any questions or concerns during the repayment period that's clear is there a maximum or minimum amount i can apply for under this financing the financing amount depends on your needs and financial capacity generally there is a minimum financing amount but there is flexibility to accommodate the size of your agricultural operations we can discuss your specific requirements to determine an appropriate arrangement what kinds of repayment terms are available i'm curious if they can be adjusted for farmers like me since farming income can be seasonal that's a valid point jamal we recognize that farming income is often seasonal while repayment terms are typically fixed we can structure the installments to align with your harvest cycles which could make managing payments more convenient for you that's good to hear what happens if i face unexpected challenges and find it difficult to repay on time if you encounter difficulties we recommend reaching out to us promptly in islamic banking penalties that are purely punitive are avoided however a small administrative fee may be charged to cover actual costs as permitted under shi our aim is to collaborate with you on a solution that is fair and manageable that's reassuring are there any additional fees or charges i should be aware of all applicable fees such as administrative or processing charges will be disclosed to you upfront before you proceed transparency is a core principle in islamic banking and we ensure that there are no hidden charges i appreciate that how long does the entire process usually take from application to receiving the finance asset once we have received your application and all required documents
